attributes.action: Change the school year so that there are equal terms.
attributes.background: The autumn term is too long and exhausting for children and teachers.  6 weeks is the optimum time for children's learning.  It would also mean more opportunities for families to go on holidays.  It would also stop the cramming of work into the short term in the spring.

rejection.details: Schools are responsible for setting their own term dates. You could make this suggestion to the governing body of the school.
